content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_brick_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 15, "index": 10}, {"type": "white_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "glass_bottle", "quantity": 63, "index": 22}, {"type": "campfire", "quantity": 25, "index": 30}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 24, "index": 32}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}, {"type": "music_disc_strad", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft prismarine_brick_stairs, I need to place 3 prismarine bricks in the shape of stairs in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one prismarine brick from slot 35 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_brick_stairs

thought: The next prismarine brick needs to go below the first one, so I will move it from slot 35 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 4 with quantity 1
